title: Save
description: Save the current project and exit to the Home page.

title: Stage
description: This is where the action takes place in the project. To delete a character, press and hold it.

title: Presentation Mode
description: Expand the stage to the full screen.

title: Grid
description: Toggle on (and off) the x-y coordinate grid.

title: Change Background
description: Select or create a background image for the stage.

title: Add Text
description: Write titles and labels on the stage.

title: Reset Characters
description: Reset all characters to their starting positions on the stage. (Drag characters to set up new starting positions.)

title: Green Flag
description: Start all programming scripts that begin with a "Start on Green Flag" block by tapping here.

title: Pages
description: Select among the pages in your project — or tap the plus sign to add a new page. Each page has its own set of characters and a background. To delete a page, press and hold it. To reorder pages, drag them to new positions.

title: Project Information
description: Change the title of the project, see when the project was created, and share the project (if supported by your device).

title: Undo and Redo
description: If you make a mistake, tap Undo to go back in time, reversing the last action. Tap Redo to reverse the last Undo.

title: Programming Script
description: Snap blocks together to make a programming script, telling the character what to do. Tap anywhere on a script to make it run. To delete a block or script, drag it outside the programming area. To copy a block or script from one character to another, drag it onto the character's thumbnail.

title: Programming Area
description: This is where you connect programming blocks to create scripts, telling the character what to do.

title: Blocks Palette
description: This is the menu of programming blocks. Drag a block into the programming area, then tap on it to see what it does.

title: Block Categories
description: This is where you can select a category of programming blocks: Triggering Blocks (Yellow), Motion (Blue), Looks (Purple), Sounds (Green), Control (Orange), End Blocks (Red).

title: Characters
description: Select among the characters in your project — or tap the plus sign to add a new one. Once a character is selected, you can edit its scripts, tap its name to rename it, or tap the paintbrush to edit its image. To delete a character, press and hold it. To copy a character to another page, drag it to the page thumbnail.
